All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Answer
Answer interface is implemented by every server's answer because it allows to serialize them and client can recognize them.
Assistant
Cards to play during planning phase, each one has a value and a max movement for mother nature.
Bag
This is the bag class, its job is to hold the 120 student tokens and provide random draws.
BagListener
Used to notify changes to the bag
CardMessage
CardMessage contains the chosen card.
CardsSceneController
CardsSceneController is the controller of the CardsScene.fxml
ChosenCloud
ChosenCloud contains the chosen cloud.
CLI
Command Line Interface
Client
Starts the connection with the server.
CloudsManager
CloudsManger keeps track of all information regarding clouds with their students.
CloudsSceneController
CloudsSceneController is the controller for CloudsScene.fxml
CloudStudentAnswer
CloudStudentAnswer contains info about an update of students on a cloud.
CoinsAnswer
CoinsAnswer contains an update of a player's coins.
CoinsListener
Used to notify a change in the coins value for a given player
Controller
Controller class controls model and communicates with server.
ControllerServer
ControllerServer is used by Controller to comunicate with Server;
CreateSpecial
Factory interface.
CreateSpecial1
Create Special1
CreateSpecial10
Create Special10
CreateSpecial11
Create Special11
CreateSpecial12
Create Special12

Create Special2

Create Special3

Create Special4

Create Special5

Create Special7
CreateSpecial8
Create Special8
CreateSpecial9
Create Special9
DisconnectedAnswer
DisconnectedAnswer said to a client that the server will close socket soon.
DisconnectedListener
Notifies when a client disconnects from the server
EndGameException
Thrown by moveMotherNature in case of game over.
Entrance
Entrance interface is used to send incoming messages from clients to Server.
Eriantys
Eriantys app.
Exit
Exit interface is used to send to clients information from Server.
Exit
Exit interface is used to send to clients information from Server.
ExpertGame
ExpertGame create on server the class SpecialDeck ready for clients to use special characters.
Game
Game contains all manager of the model.
GameInfo
GameInfo contains the game setting of this game.
GameInfoAnswer
GameInfoAnswer contains info about the current game.
GameManager
This interface is used to interface Game to Controller
GameOverAnswer
GameOverAnswer contains info about the team winner.
GameOverSceneController
GameOverSceneController is the controller of GameOverScene.fxml
GenericAnswer
GenericAnswer is a generic answer contains only a string message.
GenericMessage
GenericMessage is a generic message with just a string.
GUI
GUI class starts the graphical user interface.
HandAfterRestoreAnswer
HandAfterRestoreAnswer contains info about cards of last saved game of the recipient player.
InfoSpecial1or7or11Answer
InfoSpecial1or7or11Answer contains info about a color's number of students on special1, special7 or special11.
InfoSpecial5Answer
InfoSpecial5Answer contains info about the number of noEntryCards on special5.
InhibitedIslandAnswer
InhibitedIslandAnswer contains info about the number of noEntryCards on an island.
InhibitedListener
Notifies how many noEntry Tiles are on a given island, from 0 to 4
IslandListener
notify the reference to the island tile that needs to be deleted after it is unified to another (so it is removed from the islands' list)
IslandManagerTest
 
IslandsManager
IslandManager contains all the information about islands and mother nature.
IslandStudentAnswer
IslandStudentAnswer contains info about the number of student of a color on an island.
IslandTowersColorAnswer
IslandTowersColorAnswer contains info about the towers' color on an island.
IslandTowersNumberAnswer
IslandTowersNumberAnswer contains info about the towers' number on an island.
LastCardAnswer
LastCardAnswer contains info about the last card played from a player.
LoginAnswer
LoginAnswer contains info about the already chosen characters from the other players, and a message that invite client to procede with login.
LoginRestoreAnswer
LoginRestoreAnswer invite client to procede with login, inserting the nickname of previous game.
LoginRestoreSceneController
 
LoginSceneController
LoginSceneController is the controller for LoginScene.fxml The user insert his nickname and choose a character
MainSceneController
MainSceneController is the controller of the MainScene.fxml file.
Match
This interface is used by RoundController for comunicate with controller.
MaxMovementMotherNatureAnswer
MaxMovementMotherNatureAnswer contains info about the max movement of mother nature for recipient player.
Message
Message interface is implemented by every client's message because it allows to serialize them and server can recognize them.
MotherPositionAnswer
MotherPositionAnswer contains info about the mother nature position.
MotherPositionListener
Notifies the index of the island where Mother Nature is currently located, from 0 to 11
MoveMotherNature
MoveMotherNature contains the chosen number of steps.
MoveNotAllowedAnswer
MoveNotAllowedAnswer said to a client that last play is not allowed by Eriantys rules.
MoveStudent
MoveStudent contains the chosen student to be moved and the place where it has to be moved..
NoEntryClientListener
Used on the client to notify the changes caused by special card 5
NoEntryListener
Used on the server to notify the changes caused by special card 5
NotAllowedException
This exception is thrown when the user makes a move that is not allowed.
PingMessage
PingMessage is sent to server every 5 seconds to check if server is online.
PlayCardAnswer
PlayCardAnswer invite client to procede with PlanningPhase.
PlayedCardListener
Used to notify when a card has been played and the list of cards the player currently has
PlayerConstants
This class is used tto know which phase have been done and continue with the next one.
PlayerManager
PlayerManger keeps track of all information regarding players and their schools.
PongAnswer
PongAnswer is the answer of the server to ping message.
PongListener
Used to notify when a pong message arrives.
Printable
Printable contains all the print of the cli.
ProfessorAnswer
ProfessorAnswer contains info about holding or not a professor of a color by a player.
ProfessorsListener
Notifies if the player has in his school the professor of a given color.
Proxy_c
Proxy_s is client's proxy, it manages connections with server.
Proxy_s
Proxy_s is server's proxy, it manages connections with clients and excess connections.
QueueListener
Used in the server to notify the order of play each turn, based on the played cards
QueueManager
QueueManger keeps track of all information regarding turns of player.
Receiver
It reads every message in input from the server and sort it.
Restore
This interface is used by VirtualView for comunicate with controller.
RestoreCardsListener
Used to restore the cards of a player when loading a file save of the game
Round
 
RoundController
RoundController manage the round subdivided in planningPhase and actionPhase.
RoundSpecial1
Round strategy used by special 1.
RoundSpecial10
Round strategy used by special 10
RoundSpecial11
Round strategy used by special 11
RoundSpecial12
Round strategy used by special 12.
RoundSpecial2
Round strategy used by special 2, it overrides moveStudent and use its effect.
RoundSpecial3
Round strategy used by special 3.
RoundSpecial4
Round strategy used by special 3.
RoundSpecial5
Round strategy used by special 5.
RoundSpecial6
Round strategy used by special 2, it overrides move mother nature and highInfluence.
RoundSpecial7
Round strategy used by special 7.
RoundSpecial8
Round strategy used by special 2, it overrides highInfluenceTeam and use its effect.
RoundSpecial9
Round strategy used by special 9, it overrides highInfluenceTeam and use its effect.
RoundStrategy
Strategy for special card.
RoundStrategyFactory
It is used to return the special that corresponds to the number.
RoundStrategyTest
 
SavedGameAnswer
SavedGameAnswer contains info about the number of players and the game mode of the last saved game.
SavedSceneController
 
SceneController
SceneController interface is implemented by all the controllers of the scenes of the game
SchoolStudentAnswer
SchoolStudentAnswer contains info about a color's students number in a school.
SchoolTowersAnswer
SchoolTowersAnswer contains info about the number of towers in a school.
Server
Server creates the server, comunicate with controller and send to it data received from clients.
ServerController
ServerController is used by Server to comunicate with Controller.
ServerOfflineListener
Used to notify when the server goes offline
SetSpecialAnswer
SetSpecialAnswer contains info about the cost of a special.
SetupConnection
SetupConnection contains the chosen nickname and character.
SetupGame
SetupGame contains the chosen number of player and if the game will be in expert mode.
SetupGameAnswer
SetupGameAnswer is sent to the first client connected after its "Ready for login".
SetupSceneController
SetupSceneController is the controller class of SetupScene.fxml SetupScene is to be shown only to the first player to choose number of player and expert mode
SoldOut
SoldOut reply with an answer that notifies you that there are no more connections available in the current game.
SoldOutAnswer
SoldOutAnswer comunicate to the client that are nor available connections for this game and the socket will be close soon.
Special
Special abstract class is extended by all special and overrides its methods.
Special
Special interface used by SpecialDeck to use special character's method.
Special1
Special1 server class.
Special10
Special10 server class.
Special10Message
Special10Message contains all the chosen parameters to use it.
Special10Test
 
Special11
Special11 server class.
Special11Message
Special11Message contains all the chosen parameters to use it.
Special11Test
 
Special12
Special12 server class.
Special12Message
Special12Message contains all the chosen parameters to use it.
Special1Message
Special1Message contains all the chosen parameters to use it.
Special1Test
 
Special2
Special2 server class.
Special3
Special3 server class.
Special3Message
Special3Message contains all the chosen parameters to use it.
Special4
Special4 server class
Special5
Special5 server class
Special5Message
Special5Message contains all the chosen parameters to use it.
Special5Test
 
Special6
Special6 server class.
Special7
Special7 server class.
Special7Message
Special7Message contains all the chosen parameters to use it.
Special7Test
 
Special8
Special8 server class.
Special9
Special9 server class.
Special9Message
Special9Message contains all the chosen parameters to use it.
Special9or12SceneController
Special9or12Controller is the controller of the scene used by special 9 and special 12.
SpecialDeck
SpecialDeck contains the list of Special of this match anf allowed to use their effect from its.
SpecialListener
Used to notify special cards
SpecialsSceneController
SpecialsSceneController is the controller of the specials scene.
SpecialStudentsListener
Used to notify the changes of the students on a card, for those special cards that requires students on
StartTurnAnswer
StartTurnAnswer invite client to procede with actionPhase.
StudentsListener
Used to notify when there's a student change somewhere in the game
Table
Tabel class is used to handle the creation and deletion of students at the schools' tables
Team
The teams in play during the match.
TowersListener
Used to notify when there's a towers change somewhere in the game
UnifiedIslandAnswer
UnifiedIslandAnswer contains info about the island that joined with another.
UserInfoAnswer
UserInfoAnswer contains info about a player.
UserInfoListener
Used to notify the nickname and character of a player
UseSpecial
UseSpecial contains the chosen number of special.
UseSpecialAnswer
UseSpecialAnswer contains info about who played a special character.
View
View contains all the variable of the game and updates it using view answer received from server.
VirtualClient
VirtualClient manage all exchanges of information between Server and Client.
VirtualView
Virtual View class listen to changes in model classes through specific listener interfaces.
WaitingSceneController
WaitingSceneController is the controller of the WaitingScene.fxml It is loaded when waiting for other players to connect
WinnerListener
Used to notify when the game is over because someone won
